summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 18652 entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of from a point 36 feet west of the east roadway on Railroad Avenue to a connection with the existing plank roadway on Railroad Avenue, by construction of a plank roadway 42 feet in width, all in accordance with Resolution No. 927 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle" approved June 24, 1908.
